headline: Medtronic (MDT) Rises But Trails Market: What Investors Should Know
summary: The latest trading day saw Medtronic (MDT) settling at $83.75, representing a +0.46% change from its previous close.

headline: Field Medical raises $40M for PFA in ventricular tachycardia
summary: Led by Farapulse founder Steven Mickelsen, Field has developed a pulsed field ablation device to tackle the dangerous heart rhythm disorder.

headline: Orchestra BioMed Announces AVIM Therapy-Focused Satellite Symposium at HRS 2025 Annual Meeting
